text: phir Allah tala ne ek kawwe ko bheja jo zamin khod raha tha,ta ke ose dikhae ke wo kis tarah apne bhai ki naash ko chupa de,wo kehne laga, hay afsoos! kya main aisa karne se bhi gaya guzra ho gaya ke us kawwe ki tarah apne bhai ki lash ko dafna deta? phir to (bada hee) pasheman aur sharminda ho gaya
